title: what do you know about courier?
content: what do you know or think about the typeface courier?
author: tesstess

comments.content:
[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Courier\_%28typeface%29](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201072352/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Courier_%28typeface%29 "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Courier\_%28typeface%29")

What do I think of it? From a designer standpoint I think it carries a bit of Americana with it and I find it a decent face when needing to go a bit casual without dipping down to Comic Sans territory.
